reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft and comfortable, particularly noting it's suitable for Florida winters, with a perfect tunic length and good fit. They appreciate its lightweight nature, casual trend style, and variety of colors, with one customer mentioning it complements blonde or light brown hair. While the material thickness receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting it's super thin, the overall qualit

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Sweater for Fall or Winter, Long sleeves, Tunic Length, Wood Buttons, Many Colors
items.body: I ordered this as a gift for my daughter. The color is slightly off-pink, which should look great on her. The material is very soft, a bit on the thin side but that should work well here in the desert, where it is seldom really cold. I ordered a size Medium and it appears to be spot-on. It’s tunic length so it will work well with pants or leggings. It can be dressed up with some jewelry or left as is for casual occasions. Since I haven’t given it to her yet I can’t comment to its wash-ability but other commenters say it is washer & dryer safe without pilling or shrinkage. I’ll edit my review if there are any problems with it. As is I’d recommend this sweaters to others, for it’s decent quality and reasonable price. Read more
items.author: Cathy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, true to size, great sleeve length, warm
items.body: Update: I'm purchasing more of these! It washed well (cold water, Ecos detergent, tumble dry high heat) and did not lose any softness or size. A hard ask for clothes in my size. Comfortable, warm, stretchy. I'm 5'5", 205lb, short torso, broad shoulders and very curvy with a 36G cup. This actually works for me. It's hard to find women's shirts that fit my shoulders, have long enough sleeves, and are also long enough at the hip. I run an XL or 2XL most of the time and chose 2XL for this one. I do wish it was a hair longer at the hip but it's really quite fine. It's lightweight and not very thick, but somehow very warm, perfect for a VT winter. I also like that I can unbutton the buttons when the neckline feels too tight. The only thing I'm concerned about is washing this, we'll see how it holds up. Overall very pleased with this and made buy more if it washes well. Read more
items.author: WayfaringButterfly

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice!
items.body: Very soft and comfortable. Also very pretty. Nice color to wear with jeans. Read more
items.author: Deb Hanks

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfortable
items.body: Nice lightweight sweater for cool Fall days in the Southwest! I ordered size XXL, (I’m normally a size XL or 2X depending on brand) and this top was roomy enough to be comfortable but not sloppy looking. For a more fitted look I could have easily sized down and still had a nice non clinging fit. Sweater is nice and soft and I’m going to enjoy wearing this, Read more
items.author: RES

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great light sweater!
items.body: This turned out to be a great knit top. Extremely soft and warmer than expected. It’s great for layering. I’m 5’4” 152lbs and the medium fits perfectly. It still would’ve fit me if I were taller, heavier, or lighter. It didn’t shrink, stretch, or change at all after the first two washes in normal/warm and machine dry normal. This was a great purchase and I might get another! Read more
items.author: Andorra C Shek

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft!
items.body: I love this sweater and wear it all the time. It's a beautiful shade of brown and so incredibly soft. I'm 5'5", 135 lbs, 34C, and the medium fits perfectly, a little loose but not baggy. Hangs nicely. The arms are long enough. It looks just like the picture. It's lightweight but not too thin or cheap-feeling. Great value for the money. Read more
items.author: Shawnee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love mine
items.body: Very comfy and soft. Fit true to size. In a weight loss journey and needed new tips without spending too much. Great quality and price. Read more
items.author: Darlene Cooley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and fashionable
items.body: I really like this sweater, it’s not too heavy and not too thin. Just right for fall and spring. The color is great. I got blue. It’s soft to the touch washes nicely and I haven’t had any issues with pilling yet. Read more
items.author: Christine

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Z-coffee, Dark Grey, Purple Red, Black, Coffee, Z-caramel, Beige, Z-apricot, Z-black2, Grey, Z-black, Maroon, Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
